div.h1:
Denville Township School District
The Denville School District's mission is to educate and empower all students to excel.

div.div: Town Hall, 1 St. Mary's Pl., 2nd Floor, Denville, NJ 07834

span.span:
The Denville PK-8 Schools will be closed starting Monday, March 16, 2020. As of March 18, 2020, Governor Murphy closed all schools
in New Jersey until further notice.
